title: SEC met with Grayscale and seven other spot Bitcoin ETF applicants in late November
description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has recently disclosed meetings with several asset managers regarding their proposed spot Bitcoin ETFs. On Nov. 29, the SEC said that its Division of Trading and Markets members met with several Grayscale employeesÂ and the law firm Davis Polk on the same day. Grayscale CEO Michael Sonnenshein was among those […]

The post SEC met with Grayscale and seven other spot Bitcoin ETF applicants in late November appeared first on CryptoSlate.
